QuestData.Title: Into the Hollow
QuestData.Description: I've learned that the Shadow Council is using the nearby deathweb spiders' venom to spread fel corruption and augment their forces after their defeat at the Burning Front.$B$BOne of my soulbinders saw a dreadlord headed into the eastern mines with Sha'tari, one of the remaining pieces of the Heart of Auchindoun.$B$BI need you to wrest Sha'tari from the dreadlord's quivering corpse and bring it to me, champion.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Xanatos the Defiler in Deathweb Hollow and retrieve Sha'tari.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did the demon have Sha'tari as we thought?
QuestData.RewardText: Just as I suspected. Thank you, $n. With Sha'tari back in our possession there is only one piece of the Heart left to retrieve.
